description: The function should return a list of prime factors of the input number.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function 'prime_factors' should take an integer 'n' as input and return a list of its prime factors. def prime_factors(n): i = 2 factors =[] while i * i <= n: if n % i: i += 1 else: n //= i factors.append(i + 1) if n > 1: factors.append(n) return factors
